gettysburg.common

Interface GbgUnit


  • public interface GbgUnit

    The GbgUnit class contains all of the information about a unit in the game. Many of the attributes are for use by the client if it has some sort of a user interface that needs to display unit information.

    Version:
    Jun 9, 2017

    • Method Summary
